channel.title: Hamachi
channel.description: Ok I just downloaded hamachi and i dont know how to get on to play can anyone tell me how? plz

item.title: Hamachi
item.dc:creator: @bloodbath32 bloodbath32
item.description:
@bloodbath32 wrote:

[quote=“Mod J, post:3, topic:6474”]After you open Hamachi and have went through the tutorial, choose the server amd the servers pass.
It will then log you in to that room.
Next you need to open up Moparscape. Choose file -> New Server and type in the ip.
Enter your name and pass and you will be able to play on the server.[/quote]
Couldn’t of said it better myself Mod J.

Read full topic

item.title: Hamachi
item.dc:creator: @Mod_J Mod J
item.description:
@Mod_J wrote:

After you open Hamachi and have went through the tutorial, choose the server amd the servers pass.
It will then log you in to that room.
Next you need to open up Moparscape. Choose file -> New Server and type in the ip.
Enter your name and pass and you will be able to play on the server.
